content: materials needed cat butt coaster 10 yards depending on size size g 4 00 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors size 4 yarn used in images but any size will do may change amount of row needed sewing needle and thread yarn used in images big twist value black pink white and chocolate brown stitch guide us terms chain chain magic_ring magic_ring/circle slip_stitch slip stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half double crochet stitch half_double_crochet increase 2 half_double_crochet in the same st double_crochet double_crochet when st counts appear in parentheses repeat disclaimer ©fleetingobsessionsart2023 all information and photos are the sole property of fleeting obsessions art and krista mccloud do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way items made by this pattern made be sold as long as pattern credit is given to fleeting obsessions art via any of the hashtags or links below social media #fleetingobsessionsart #fleetingobsessionscrafts website https //fleetingobsessionsart squarespace com facebook fleeting obsessions | facebook tiktok @fleetingobsessionsart | tiktok instagram @fleetingobsessionsart youtube 6 fleeting obsessions art - youtube pattern notes please read all pattern notes - they are important and were included for specific assistance throughout the build if you have questions about the pattern please read through all notes first before submitting a request for assistance if you find that you are off by a stitch while working do not fret you can easily slip an increase version 2 butthole or decrease in the row to get back on track these tiny mistakes are very forgiving in this pattern if you want the star or x hole version… there are 2 versions of this coaster get your needle and pink yarn starting rom the back stitch an x or star over your magic_ring version 1 has the butthole made as the first row *pro tip be sure to tie your ends off with the end version 2 you will stitch the butthole on later in a of your magic_ring this secures our magic_ring perfectly star or x shape *if you want an extra puckered butthole you can do row 2 in the blo when making version 1 that s all there is my friends you can add cork bottoms to them or block them to make them sturdier enjoy full length video making version one of the coaster happy international cat day *version 1 use pink yarn for row 1 *version 2 use your cat colors for all row a note from the creator - row 1 make a magic_ring 8 single_crochet pull ring tight and slip_stitch to i wanted to thank you for downloading my pattern the first single_crochet 8 love and support i have received since i started this *version 1 change to your cat colors journey has been amazing - row 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet increase in each stitch slip_stitch to first my goal with every pattern is to make it easily readable half_double_crochet 16 and adjustable to your own personal preferences i hope that by the end of this pattern you have
